statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT id, cost, transportation_type FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT report_id, cost, route FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE transportation_type = 'Train';
SELECT id, cost, transportation_type, route FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY cost DESC, route ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transportation_type, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY transportation_type HAVING avg_cost > 1000
SELECT report_id, MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY report_id
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE transportation_type = 'Car' AND cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT DISTINCT transportation_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY transportation_type HAVING count >= 3
SELECT * FROM TransportationCosts;
SELECT report_name, cost FROM TransportationCosts WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT report_name, transportation_type FROM TransportationCosts WHERE transportation_type LIKE '%car%';
SELECT report_name, cost FROM TransportationCosts ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT opportunity_description, cost_saving_amount FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE cost_saving_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM TransportationCosts WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY report_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, cost FROM TransportationCosts WHERE transportation_type = 'Car' AND cost < 5000;
SELECT report_name, cost FROM TransportationCosts WHERE transportation_type = 'Train' UNION SELECT opportunity_description, cost_saving_amount FROM CostSavingOpportunities;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reports FROM TransportationCosts;
SELECT report_name, SUM(cost) as total_cost FROM TransportationCosts GROUP BY report_name HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance, cost_per_mile FROM transportation_details WHERE cost_per_mile > 0.5;

SELECT detail_id, route_name, savings_amount FROM transportation_details JOIN cost_saving_opportunities ON transportation_details.detail_id = cost_saving_opportunities.detail_id WHERE savings_amount >= 1000;
SELECT report_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_transportation_cost FROM transportation_costs GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_transportation_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT report_name, total_cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;

SELECT tc.report_name, td.route_name, td.distance, td.cost_per_mile, cso.savings_amount FROM transportation_costs tc JOIN transportation_details td ON tc.report_id = td.report_id JOIN cost_saving_opportunities cso ON td.detail_id = cso.detail_id WHERE cso.savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY cso.savings_amount DESC;

SELECT tc.report_name, SUM(td.distance) AS total_distance, SUM(td.cost_per_mile * td.distance) AS total_cost FROM transportation_costs tc JOIN transportation_details td ON tc.report_id = td.report_id GROUP BY tc.report_name;

SELECT tc.report_name, td.route_name, td.distance, cso.savings_amount, cso.recommended_action FROM transportation_costs tc JOIN transportation_details td ON tc.report_id = td.report_id LEFT JOIN cost_saving_opportunities cso ON td.detail_id = cso.detail_id WHERE cso.savings_amount IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cso.savings_amount DESC, td.distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs;
SELECT origin, destination, mode_of_transport FROM routes ORDER BY origin DESC;
SELECT description, cost_reduction FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE cost_reduction > 500;
SELECT date, report_name, report_description FROM reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT route_id, distance, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, route_id, cost FROM transportation_costs WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT origin, destination FROM routes WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Train' AND origin <> destination;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE cost_reduction > 1000 ORDER BY opportunity_id ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM reports WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT report_id, report_date, total_cost FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_costs WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT opportunity_id, description, potential_savings FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE potential_savings >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM transportation_costs WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT report_date, total_cost FROM transportation_costs ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type, purchase_date FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_efficiency > 30 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, cost FROM maintenance_costs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT origin, destination, distance, estimated_duration FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY estimated_duration ASC;
